        This method builds the first set of the grammar (containing the first sets of variables and terminals)
        Returns:
        first the first set of the grammar (containing the first sets of each symbol)

      • buildFollow

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> buildFollow()

        Returns:
        follow the follow set of the grammar (containing the follow sets of each variable)

      • buildActionTable

        public void buildActionTable()
        This method builds the action table of the current grammar.

      • isLL

        public boolean isLL​(int n)
        This method checks whether each entry of the action table of the current grammar contains at most n rules
        Parameters:
        n - the maximum number of rules for an entry of the action table
        Returns:
        true if the grammar is LL(n) or false otherwise (for n = 1 the method returns true if the grammar is LL(1))

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method builds a string representation of all the elements related to the action table (first set, follow set, action table)
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        str a string representation of the whole class (first set, follow set, action table)
